name: MovieInfo
0:
”Alexa open Movie Info”
”Alexa start Movie Info and describe titanic”
”Alexa ask movie info to give me a synopsis of The Godfather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie info
des:
Thinking of going out and watching a movie? Why don't you listen to a brief description of it first?
You can easily launch this skill by asking Alexa to start Movie Info.
With Movie Info,you can easily get a synopsis of any movie with simple phrases like "Alexa, ask movie info to tell me about Titanic","Describe Titanic","Give me a synopsis of The Godfather" etc after you have invoked the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
